page.title: 11UNEMPLOYMENT
page.content: {UNEMPLOYMENT: }Antrim has a 25% unemployment rate. {TRAINING SCHEMES: }Antrim Community Workshop Limited was offically opened in 1983.It is based at the British Enkalon site on the Randalstown Road,Antrim.At the request of the Department of Economic Development the workshop was set up by local business men to provide a practical alternative to the dole queue. {COURSES: }Courses offered at the community workshop are catering ,office administration,vehicle maintenance,general engineering,wood working,horticulture and painting and decorating.The workshop operates on an industrial basis with trainees learning the disciplines of time keeping,cleanliness,health+safety and quality consciousness etc.
